explanation: The analysis of service logs shows that there are 2 services generating warnings, while only 1 service is recording errors. This indicates that warnings are more widespread across multiple services, which could require attention to ensure system stability and prevent potential escalation to errors.
query: level in ("WARN", "ERROR") | summarize count() by resource.service.name

widgets.query: level in ("WARN", "ERROR") | summarize count() by resource.service.name
widgets.title: Warning and Error Counts by Service
